title: The Truman Show
description: An entire human life recorded on an intricate network of hidden cameras. Broadcast live 24/7 from Seahaven Island, enclosed in the largest studio ever constructed.
quote: Good morning! And in case I donâ€™t see you, good afternoon, good evening, and goodnight!
